attributes.title: HORRIBLE, TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Before I downloaded this app my phone was perfectly fine, after downloading this app my phone began to be really slow and I was getting very many ads and the app was very glitchy. If you want your phone to stay how it is I highly recommend not downloading this app because it will ruin your phone 👎

attributes.title: Chinese Virus
attributes.review: This app is TRASH! I had to get a new phone because it gave my phone gonorrhea for phones! It’s slow and it has the Chinese Virus talks about on the news. So terrible that I thought I was gonna get it. Do not recommend using and I would like to speak to your manager about it. This is not okay and I want my money back! I am the victim here.

attributes.title: Worst app👎🏻👎🏼👎🏽👎🏾👎🏿
attributes.review: It sent a virus into my phone I had to get a new one. And it is sooo horrible. Would never recommend. It glitched my whole phone and changed my photos from the original ones to the Trump 2020 photos. This should be deleted. I thought this would be a better app based off the system creating it.

attributes.title: NEEDS TO BE TAKEN OFF THE APP STORE
attributes.review: He is an absolute maniac and can not handle situations well. He hides away as we fight for what is right. For what? To try and protect his ego?? Because if that’s the case, he should have been trying before he ruined it how many years ago. This app needs to be taken down. I do not support the ideas and thoughts projected through this app.

attributes.title: WORST APP ON THE PLANET
attributes.review: It was fine at first until then it just started glitching I kept on glitching in time I open the app and my battery will go down super fast any time I was using it it’s not stable at all I had to keep in keep on charging my phone to use this app I don’t recommend this app at all if it had a zero star I would use it.

attributes.title: so many problems in this app
attributes.review: there’s so many flaws in this app whoever developed it or whatever clearly didn’t know what they were doing. this app freezes makes noise all the time and even lets out a really loud noise that says “who put the muffins in the freezer” 0/10 i downloaded this app bc i clearly dint care about other lives and the app wouldn’t even let me open it. it’s really bad it’s constantly lagging and no matter how much u try i just can’t use it properly bc i’m a boomer and above the age of 50. if you got to this far you should rate it a one star. horrible app.

attributes.title: terrible spyware on american ppl!!!
attributes.review: this app is actually a secret way for the chinese government to get your data!!! they have it linked to you icloud once you open it and send everything to china!!! please please please get this to the supreme court to get this app shut down!!!!!! the american people and YOUTH need to be protected😠😠 this app will ruin our way of life!! also blm and acab bbyyyyy

attributes.title: don’t download!!!
attributes.review: so I downloaded the app of course. It was fine for the first couple minutes and then I clicked on different tabs in the app and my phone shut off. Since then my phone glitches randomly and will die when it was at 90%. Please don’t download it’s not worth it, it’ll only give viruses!!

attributes.title: Worst App ever
attributes.review: 100% do not recommend. All it does is say it’s the greatest app of all time without doing anything. Also do not let your parents over the age of 40 download. Our parents and grandparents are at an impressionable age and this app is totally inappropriate for them. Soon enough they’ll be saying “all lives matter.” Just disgusting.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP😡👊🏽
attributes.review: this app is just absolutely DESPICABLE! an absolute scam👺 I was looking into finding out the wonders that this app holds by the Orange man 🍊and out of nowhere the words “GRAB EM BY THE P***Y” pops up🗿🤢 WHAT EVEN IS THAT???? GROSS MAN! and not just that but it then started charging me money towards a petition to build a wall???? we just got the hole in our wall fixed in my house I don’t get it😔 absolutely awful app- abolish him👹whoops I mean him🙈✨
